H0.text: what was jesse james killed with. Rope

H1.text: what was jesse james killed with. Poison

H2.text: what was jesse james killed with. Sword

H3.text: what was jesse james killed with. Firearm

A4.text: Robert Ford drew his weapon and shot the unarmed Jesse James in the back of the head.

A5.text: Oran Baker, Hood County sheriff, conducted a visual postmortem exam and found he had thirty-two bullet wounds and a rope burn around his neck.
